law.catch_line: Slate of candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor.
law.text: A slate of candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor filing a notification and declaration pursuant to KRS 118.125 shall list on the notification and declaration the names of the candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor who shall jointly appear on the ballot. The slate of candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor shall be nominated jointly by the casting by each voter of a single vote applicable to both offices. No candidate for Governor or Lieutenant Governor shall appear individually on the ballot for the nomination he is seeking.
